items.description: Are you getting a lot of requests to create new Microsoft Teams as more people work from home ? Want to learn how to create an app to accept requests, create approval using Power Automate to finally create a new team using Graph API HTTP requests?

items.name: Chat Bot with Power Apps, Power Automate, and LUIS
items.description: Potential description for the sample reference
items.url: Chatbots are becoming widely implemented by corporations as they are one of the most advanced expressions of interaction between humans and machines, there are tons of options for creating chatbots similar to Power Virtual Agents. in this post we demonstrate a low cost method of developing a chatbot with PowerApps, Power Automate, LUIS, and SharePoint. SharePoint is for data saving purpose only you can use Dataverse, Azure SQL etc.

items.description: The flows you create can trigger when a Dataverse record is created, updated, or deleted.

items.name: Create an automated flow by using Microsoft Dataverse
items.description: With the Common Data Service connector, you can create flows that are initiated by create and update events within Dataverse. Additionally, you can perform create, update, retrieve, and delete actions on records within Dataverse.
